content: ज्ञापक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [ज्ञा --णिच् --ल्यु] Making known, teaching, informing, indicating &c. --कः {@--1@} A teacher. {@--2@} A commander, a master. {@--3@} A master of requests, an officer of the court of an Indian prince; <ls>Pt. 3.</ls> --कं (In <ab>phil.</ab>) A significant expression, a suggestive rule or precept, said of such rules as imply something more than what is actually expressed by the words of those rules themselves.
